lead_paragraph: Aides to Mr. McConnell said the bill would provide a new platform for showcasing what Republicans view as Mr. Obama’s failings in combating the Islamic State.

headline.print_headline: McConnell Clears Path for Debate on Giving Obama Broad Powers to Combat ISIS
headline.main: McConnell Clears Path for Debate on Giving Obama Broad Powers to Combat ISIS

snippet: Aides to Mr. McConnell said the bill would provide a new platform for showcasing what Republicans view as Mr. Obama’s failings in combating the Islamic State.
abstract: Senate majority leader Mitch McConnell moves to introduce bill that would broaden Pres Obama's powers in fight against Islamic State; measure, sponsored by Sen Lindsay Graham, is response to request president made of Congress in State of the Union speech.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
